firstcoursecausaldata 0.1.0

Finasteride Multicenter Trial Dataset

Source: R/data.R
finasteride.Rd

A dataset from Gould (1998) containing summary statistics from a stratified randomized trial studying the efficacy and tolerability of finasteride for treating benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH). Within each of the 29 centers, patients were randomized into three arms: control, finasteride 1mg, and finasteride 5mg. The centers serve as strata in this stratified randomized experiment (SRE).

Usage

finasteride

Format

A data frame with 29 observations (centers) and 10 variables:

center

Integer. Center ID (1-29)

n0

Integer. Sample size in control group

mean0

Double. Mean change in symptom score for control group

sd0

Double. Standard deviation of change for control group

n1

Integer. Sample size in finasteride 1mg group

mean1

Double. Mean change in symptom score for finasteride 1mg group

sd1

Double. Standard deviation of change for finasteride 1mg group

n5

Integer. Sample size in finasteride 5mg group

mean5

Double. Mean change in symptom score for finasteride 5mg group

sd5

Double. Standard deviation of change for finasteride 5mg group

Source

Gould, A. Lawrence. "Multi‐centre trial analysis revisited." Statistics in Medicine 17.15‐16 (1998): 1779-1797.

Data obtained from Harvard Dataverse: https://dataverse.harvard.edu/dataset.xhtml?persistentId=doi:10.7910/DVN/ZX3VEV

Details

The outcome is the change from baseline in total symptom score for BPH. The total symptom score ranges from 0 to 36 (sum of 9 questions, each scored 0-4) about symptoms of impaired urinary ability. Negative values indicate improvement in symptoms.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
data(finasteride)
summary(finasteride)
} # }
